entries.journal_entry_description: Vana Sage of the Lok Revenants wants to speak with you.
entries.task00_comm_message_text: I've had my eye on you since you arrived on Lok. Looks like you handle yourself well enough. Stop by Nym's if you want to earn a little money.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Find Vana Sage inside the Stronghold. She is near Nym of the Lok Revenants.
